concept.title: My Locker
concept.shortdesc: You can use the My Locker to manage your personalised data in single place.

conbody.p: You can view the My Locker by logging into TAMM using your SmartPass or UAEPass.

The following services can be accessed using My Locker:
Payments
Fines
Bills
Fees
Subscriptions
Etisalat
Du
Documents
Medical Insurance
Vehicle Registration
Land Documents
Driving Licence
